data.text:
Yo, Tray-chan. 
Did you see that new crowdfunding campaign?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yo, Tray-chan. 
<story>Did you see that new crowdfunding campaign?

data.text:
This one's so cool— Oh! 
Those cupcakes just released today, right?
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: They're great with Earl Grey tea.

data.processed:
<story>This one's so cool— Oh! 
<story>Those cupcakes just released today, right?

data.text:
I place the usual teacups onto the table. Transcend, 
the umamusume in front of me nods excitedly.
data.processed:
<story>I place the usual teacups onto the table. Transcend, 
<story>the umamusume in front of me nods excitedly.

data.text:
Thanks for the tea! The cupcakes are... Raspberry and 
banana... Which do you want?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Thanks for the tea! The cupcakes are... Raspberry and 
<story>banana... Which do you want?

data.text:
Actually, we can share halfsies. That way we can try both. 
Oh, right, about that new crowdfunder—
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Actually, we can share halfsies. That way we can try both. 
<story>Oh, right, about that new crowdfunder—

data.text:
We chatted like comfy friends, and it's been like this 
for a while. Right, it all started with that first encounter...
data.processed:
<story>We chatted like comfy friends, and it's been like this 
<story>for a while. Right, it all started with that first encounter...

data.text:
It was a cold and snowy day. I decided to take a breather 
from work and spend some time on my hobbies.
data.processed:
<story>It was a cold and snowy day. I decided to take a breather 
<story>from work and spend some time on my hobbies.

data.text:
I like to spend my time on things I've never seen 
or experienced before.
data.processed:
<story>I like to spend my time on things I've never seen 
<story>or experienced before.

data.text:
One such thing being the filming of a B movie. 
I was on my way to observe one, when...
data.processed:
<story>One such thing being the filming of a B movie. 
<story>I was on my way to observe one, when...

data.text: Ah, hi there. Can I stand here?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Ah, hi there. Can I stand here?

data.text:
Oh, they're starting. I wonder how it's gonna go... 
This director's known to be a bit eccentric, 
so I'm looking forward to it.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oh, they're starting. I wonder how it's gonna go... 
<story>This director's known to be a bit eccentric, 
<story>so I'm looking forward to it.

data.text: And when I went to a wacky gadget exhibition...
data.processed: <story>And when I went to a wacky gadget exhibition...

data.text:
Oh? It's you, from that film shoot. 
What a coincidence! I wonder if we have similar taste?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oh? It's you, from that film shoot. 
<story>What a coincidence! I wonder if we have similar taste?

data.text:
Did you see the main attraction? 
I like how it syncs with your phone, and it charges—
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Did you see the main attraction? 
<story>I like how it syncs with your phone, and it charges—

data.text:
We kept finding each other in different places, 
and eventually we started having small talk together.
data.processed:
<story>We kept finding each other in different places, 
<story>and eventually we started having small talk together.

data.text:
Aha, you're looking to scout someone. I see how that 
can be tricky. Tracen is full of skilled individuals.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Aha, you're looking to scout someone. I see how that 
<story>can be tricky. Tracen is full of skilled individuals.

data.text:
Hmm... I've got a proposal for you. 
I'll provide you with information.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm... I've got a proposal for you. 
<story>I'll provide you with information.

data.text:
Yep. Things you can't grasp from simply looking, 
like their personalities. Things only other 
umamusume would know!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yep. Things you can't grasp from simply looking, 
<story>like their personalities. Things only other 
<story>umamusume would know!

data.text:
Oh and... My info doesn't come free, y'know? How abooout... 
Some nice tea and snacks. Whadda ya think?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oh and... My info doesn't come free, y'know? How abooout... 
<story>Some nice tea and snacks. Whadda ya think?

data.text: Transcend has more information than could be explained just by her being an Umamusume herself... I wonder where she gets it all from.
data.processed: Transcend has more information than could be explained just by her being an Umamusume herself... I wonder where she gets it all from.

data.text: I once asked her why she only wanted tea and snacks for all of this info, and she simply replied "Because it's fun!"
data.processed: I once asked her why she only wanted tea and snacks for all of this info, and she simply replied "Because it's fun!"

data.text:
I brought the good stuff about some dirt girls today. 
I'm sure you've seen them before as well.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I brought the good stuff about some dirt girls today. 
<story>I'm sure you've seen them before as well.

data.text:
This is how our relation is. No formalities. 
It's like we've become close friends.
data.processed:
<story>This is how our relation is. No formalities. 
<story>It's like we've become close friends.

data.text:
Here's the first target. Furioso. She's got that honor student 
vibe. She speaks her mind without hesitation, so the 
timid girls tend to avoid her.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Here's the first target. Furioso. She's got that honor student 
<story>vibe. She speaks her mind without hesitation, so the 
<story>timid girls tend to avoid her.

data.text:
But she's actually not scary at all, just a bit serious. 
Also, although she may seem calm at first glance... 
She gets intense when she's going all out!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>But she's actually not scary at all, just a bit serious. 
<story>Also, although she may seem calm at first glance... 
<story>She gets intense when she's going all out!

data.name: Transcend
data.processed: She sometimes shouts "The emotions won't get to me!" while running. She came to Chuo from Funabashi, but she seems to be a bit conflicted by it.

data.text:
Next up: Espoir City. She seems a bit overly self-confident, 
like she's in her rebellious phase... If you catch my drift.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Next up: Espoir City. She seems a bit overly self-confident, 
<story>like she's in her rebellious phase... If you catch my drift.

data.text:
But really, she's pure at heart under that veneer. 
Also... I noticed when we went to the track together...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>But really, she's pure at heart under that veneer. 
<story>Also... I noticed when we went to the track together...

data.text:
She gets startled by the intensity of the giant trackside 
screens. She keeps tripping up. Looks like she's got 
a delicate side, too. Cute, right?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>She gets startled by the intensity of the giant trackside 
<story>screens. She keeps tripping up. Looks like she's got 
<story>a delicate side, too. Cute, right?

data.text:
Lastly: Smart Falcon. 
She's trying to become the top Umadol.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Lastly: Smart Falcon. 
<story>She's trying to become the top Umadol.

data.text:
Her fanservice game is on point. She's able to remember 
the faces of all her fans. Crazy, right? You'll certainly 
end up a fan as well, if you choose her.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Her fanservice game is on point. She's able to remember 
<story>the faces of all her fans. Crazy, right? You'll certainly 
<story>end up a fan as well, if you choose her.

data.text:
Even though she's considered a dirt runner, she's trying 
to main turf training recently. I wonder if it'll work out...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Even though she's considered a dirt runner, she's trying 
<story>to main turf training recently. I wonder if it'll work out...

data.text: That's all. That cheerful trio sure is interesting. Although, I bet I won't ever get tired of you either!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: That's all. That cheerful trio sure is interesting. Although, I bet I won't ever get tired of you either!

data.text:
I bet you want to see them race in person, right? 
I'll come along when you do.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I bet you want to see them race in person, right? 
<story>I'll come along when you do.

data.text:
And if you notice anything that stands out, 
be sure to let me know as well, 'kay?
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: You better pay me for that info...!

data.processed:
<story>And if you notice anything that stands out, 
<story>be sure to let me know as well, 'kay?

data.text:
Haha! I'll just pay you back with more info! 
I'll be the one to wait for the tea and snacks.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Haha! I'll just pay you back with more info! 
<story>I'll be the one to wait for the tea and snacks.

data.text:
She smiles at me like the mischievous geek she is. 
I'd better bust out the bestest snacks next time.
data.processed:
<story>She smiles at me like the mischievous geek she is. 
<story>I'd better bust out the bestest snacks next time.
